Posts.Content: mom-arizona wrote: Hi, My mom was just diagnosed with breast cancer on Jan 13th 2017. We are still waiting for a full report on biopsy. Does anyone have recommendations on best breast cancer treatment centers and physicians? I am currently looking into Banner MD Anderson in Gilbert, AZ and Cancer Treatment Center of America in Goodyear, AZ. Any recommendations are greatly apreciated. Thank you in advance!
